name: Atcursor
tag_list: softare-support, error-message-lookup, blog-editor, screen-capture-tool, bookmarks-directory, troubleshoot-software
overview:
AtCursor provides a convenient way to search and share information about any windows application on the web.

AtCursor makes various tasks that are needed in searching or providing support information about any windows application available right at the tip of cursor. For example, searching for support information on web, writing blog posts about software issues along with screenshots, bookmarking important links, sharing quick comments, tips or feedback about windows applications can be done without switching to browser or other tools. Information retrieved from current cursor position about a windows application is used for searching on the web, so user does not have to type search parameters. The same information is used for organizing bookmarked links, comments, tips and feedback into AtCursor Directory, so that, thousands of users of the same application can instantly access them. Software vendors can get quick contextual feedback from customers so they can provide support and improve their software for future releases.

milestones.description: AtCursor is launched on Windows Azure at http://atcursor.cloudapp.net
